topic.title: EMS Patient Body Temperature - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-104)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode, which MAY be selected from ValueSet EMSTEMPVS_013 NEMSIS STATIC (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-105)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-104)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode, which MAY be selected from ValueSet EMSTEMPVS_013 NEMSIS STATIC (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-105)
